#351

I don’t think it’ll be as small as the ATV.

Remember when they introduced the iPod Mini? People lost their minds because it was 80% of the price of a regular iPod but had only 20% of the storage. But it was small! Turned out Apple knew that the vast majority of iPod owners used about 1GB, enough for a few hundred songs, so didn’t care about the “lack” of storage.

I bet they believe the same about the Mac Mini—that most people will plug one thing in: a monitor. Their keyboard and mouse will be wireless and they’ll be happy.
